Comments
May 4, 2021
Organous
We all went absolutely nuts when Mighty Thor provided us with a 50 point Hulk. This piece is a bit more nuanced, but still makes for a reasonable attacker piece. It's always strange to see Impervious on a 40-point piece, but never unwelcome. She always useful in some form on any click. I think a new player would be quite satisfied running this piece for a while, even if it's underwhelming playing the star of the show at 40 points.
